main_course.name: Kofte
main_course.description: Grilled Turkish meatballs made with a blend of ground beef and lamb, served with rice and grilled vegetables.

main_course.name: Iskender Kebab
main_course.description: Sliced grilled lamb served over pieces of pide bread, topped with tomato sauce and yogurt.

main_course.name: Adana Kebab
main_course.description: Spicy minced lamb kebab served with grilled vegetables and rice.

main_course.name: Manti
main_course.description: Turkish dumplings filled with seasoned ground beef, topped with yogurt and garlic-infused butter.

main_course.name: Hunkar Begendi
main_course.description: Slow-cooked lamb served over a bed of creamy eggplant puree.

main_course.name: Pide
main_course.description: Turkish flatbread topped with a variety of ingredients such as cheese, ground meat, and vegetables.

starter.name: Cilbir
starter.description: Poached eggs served over yogurt with melted butter and garlic, topped with Aleppo pepper.

starter.name: Sigara Boregi
starter.description: Filo pastry rolls stuffed with feta cheese and parsley, fried until crispy.

starter.name: Cacik
starter.description: Refreshing yogurt and cucumber dip seasoned with garlic and mint.

starter.name: Lahmacun
starter.description: Thin, crispy dough topped with a spiced mixture of minced meat, vegetables, and herbs.

dessert.name: Baklava
dessert.description: Layers of phyllo dough filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey syrup.

dessert.name: Sutlac
dessert.description: Traditional Turkish rice pudding flavored with vanilla and cinnamon, served chilled.

dessert.name: Revani
dessert.description: Semolina cake soaked in syrup, flavored with orange or lemon.

dessert.name: Dondurma
dessert.description: Turkish ice cream made with salep, a flour made from wild orchid tubers, known for its chewy texture.

dessert.name: Kunefe
dessert.description: Shredded phyllo dough filled with sweet cheese, baked until crispy, and soaked in syrup.

drink.name: Turkish Tea
drink.description: Strong, black tea served in small tulip-shaped glasses.

drink.name: Ayran
drink.description: Refreshing yogurt drink mixed with water and a pinch of salt.

drink.name: Salgam
drink.description: Fermented turnip juice, flavored with spices, served cold.

drink.name: Turkish Coffee
drink.description: A traditional unfiltered coffee brewed in a cezve, served with foam on top.
